abstract: let cisco networking knowledge add zeroes to your salary with this training .
article: level with us ... you know it 's time to take your career up a notch , right ? time to goose the resume and add a new set of job skills that 'll put you in the running for bigger , better jobs -- not to mention , bigger , better paychecks . in the world of it tech , there are few skill sets more coveted than those of a certified network pro . cisco systems is responsible for more than half the routers and switches in use today , so get up to speed on the first name in networking with the ultimate cisco certification super bundle , which is on sale for just $ 59 from tnw deals .

as you move through the nine courses in this package , you 'll learn all the basics of the care and feeding of a cisco network ; everything from the assembly and installation to maintaining and safeguarding cisco-run systems . whether it 's hardware questions or troubleshooting or preventative measures , these courses will unlock all the answers : . cisco 100-105 : interconnecting cisco networking devices part 1 -- icnd1 v3 . cisco 200-105 : interconnecting cisco networking devices part 2 -- icnd2 v3 . cisco 210-260 : implementing cisco network security . cisco 200-355 : implementing cisco wireless networking fundamentals .

cisco 210-060 : implementing cisco collaboration devices . cisco 210-065 : implementing cisco video network devices . cisco 300-101 : route -- implementing cisco ip routing . cisco 300-115 : switch -- implementing cisco ip switched networks . cisco 300-135 : tshoot -- troubleshooting and maintaining cisco ip networks . each course is tailored to help you pass a particular cisco ccna or ccnp certification exam , leaving you with a host of cisco-approved knowledge as proof that you 're ready to use and innovate with cisco technology . all together , this is a nearly $ 3,300 package of instruction , which you can get right now for the limited time price of only $ 59 if you act before this deal ends .
